actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered to be income for the purposes of determining eligibility for a pension under that title.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered to be income for the purpose of determining eligibility for a veteran's pension. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 503(5)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that monthly social security benefit payments shall not be considered to be income for the purposes of determining eligibility for a pension under that title.
